column11: Once-in-a-lifetime; exquisite residence, 1,821sqm double block on North Avalons beachfront Claiming an absolute beachfront position bordering North Avalon\'s iconic surf break, this exquisite, pavilion-style residence is more than a match for its world-class setting. Spanning an extraordinary 1,821sqm parcel, the architecturally designed home is nestled under a canopy of Norfolk Pines and lush green lawns; it\'s one of just a handful of properties in Sydney that boasts a rare double block against the golden crest of the beach.  Remarkably private and beautifully positioned, the home can only be seen in glimpses from the beach; wrapped in galleries of glass, its north/south orientation is paired with a flawless design that\'s both innovative and luxurious. The open, pavilion concept features a grand living space at its centre, allowing the interior spaces to merge freely with front and rear entertaining decks, stunning gardens and lawns; at its centre is a commercial-grade island kitchen with a full suite of Smeg appliances and walk-in pantry. Accommodation is equally lavish with an indulgent master suite that offers floor-to-ceiling ocean views, mezzanine study and effortless access to the deck; there is also a garden guest suite that features a Japanese soak tub/spa on the ground level. + Exceptionally rare beachfront position; 1,821sqm double block, 25m wide beach frontage + Stunning home of remarkable dimension & superb quality with an unmatched setting + Pavilion design features lofty ceiling heights with galleries of glass framing the views + Perfect north/south aspect fills the open plan interiors with abundant natural light + Resort like gardens with impressive sandstone firepit overlooking the ocean + Commercial-grade island kitchen equipped with Smeg appliances, walk-in pantry + Uninterrupted flow between entertaining decks, living space and lush gardens + Family room, ultra-modern bathrooms, ocean facing bedrooms for the children or guests + Striking sandstone fireplace, heated floors, double garage with internal access + Original sandstone cottage now houses workshop, storeroom and extra garaging

\'Karala\' - Unrivalled Lifestyle & Views - Estate Setting      Blessed with due North aspect and breathtaking views of Palm Beach, which extend the length of the beach from the rockpool to Barrenjoey lighthouse and across to Pittwater, \'Karala\' is positioned on the exclusive and tightly held lower side of Pacific Road.  Discreetly nestled within 1714sqm of landscaped gardens and designed by eminent Architect Albert Hoggett, \'Karala\' evokes the essential characteristics of a classic and timeless French provincial estate whilst its intimate privacy is a hallmark of this outstanding Palm Beach residence.  Providing approximately 460sqm of internal floor space, \'Karala\' is designed across two levels.  Upon entry, the ground Floor offers a central lounge with open fireplace and soaring light filled atrium void. A stylish kitchen, formal dining room and media room flow to the wide sandstone terrace featuring a covered loggia overlooking the sensational pool and pool terrace. A spacious double bedroom suite with ensuite and powder room complete the lower level. The first floor provides a master suite and guest master suite, both with ensuite and private terraces, as well as two double bedrooms which share a fourth bathroom.  A freestanding two bedroom caretaker\'s quarters is discreetly set in the landscaped grounds, which is suitable perhaps for a nanny or teenagers. Other features include; - Marble and recycled timber floors Extensive sandstone terraces Copper roof Bi-fold and French doors Integrated sound system Zoned air conditioning  Double lock up garage Garden irrigation Part of an undeniably blue-ribbon location, \'Karala\' epitomises the lifestyle for which Palm Beach is famous and sets the standard for others to follow.

The Best Of The Best - Prized 1,616sqm North Facing Deep Waterfront On Pittwater On prestigious Stokes Point with commanding vistas across the magnificent expanse of waterway encompassing Palm Beach, Lion Island and Pearl Beach; a visual feast for the soul. Set within a highly desirable enclave of some of Australias finest and most exclusive residences Cooinda has redefined world class luxury. Architectural elements of sandstone, timber and soaring panes of glass anchor the home to the earth while cherishing the water, sun and the sky. Built with faultless attention to detail and following meticulous construction protocols, Cooinda is a peerless, triumphant union of breathtaking dimensions, timeless style, comfort and function. Fully accessible, landscaped grounds feature a truly remarkable 30-metre frontage to Pittwater; a private sandy beachfront, large boat shed and sheltered deep water berthing. Offering a unique, highly desirable experience for the discerning this will be one of the northern beaches most significant offerings this decade. When only the best will do

Award winning home is the apex of foreshore luxury Crowning this waterfront holding of 1,622sqm set with exclusive jetty access, \'Sorrento\' is a palatial residence composed by David Naylor Architects for a lifestyle of premium luxury. Opportunities in this remarkably private cul-de-sac are extremely rare. - Prized Pimas Gale project featured in Sydney Morning Herald - Glass walls optimise intimate harbour views from every level - Wonderfully spacious design formal and casual settings - Pool level provides sauna, cinema and indoor barbecue kitchen - Tropical landscape cascades to harbourfront lawn and jetties - European gourmet kitchen, cellar, granite finishes throughout - Executive office, lavish bedrooms feature spa master suite - C-Bus, air conditioning, gas fireplaces, heated flooring/pool - Security gates, alarmed home and boat house, prestige garage - Harbour privileges plus schools, shops and fine dining nearby

STUNNING SEMI IN PREMIER LOCATION Retaining many of it\'s charming original features, this beautiful semi detached, full brick home is ideal for young families, investors or downsizers.  Bright and spacious interiors combine with level gardens to create an enviable lifestyle in a premier location.  * Two generous bedrooms, master with reverse cycle air conditioning, plus study/sun room * Patterned ceilings, picture rails and polished timber floors * Open plan eat in gas kitchen flowing to casual living area * Formal dining room, gas heating * Level, sunny child friendly enclosed gardens with plunge pool * Scope for a first floor addition (STCA) * Ample off street parking * Land size approximately 341sqm * Just moments to Manly restaurants, cafs and beaches * City bus at your fingertips

\'Kahala\' - Breathtaking New Waterfront Sanctuary North Facing & Sunny Waterfront with own Beach Water Views Extensive Private & Secure 4+ King Beds with ensuites 5+ Bathrooms  Office / Study 4 Car Garage  Billiard Room Gymnasium Indoor Steam & Spa Room Fully Equipped Bar  Wine Cellar with AC Pizza Oven & Deck Heated Pool with Swim Jets & Spa Boatshed with Ramp & Facilities 1663 sqm land (approx) \'Smart\' House Climate Controlled  Audio-Visual Excellence Clothes Drying Room Parking Onsite for 10+ Cars Privately nestled on Clareville\'s most desirable street, this newly completed tri-level masterpiece sits on a cascading 1,663sqm (approx) parcel of north-facing absolute waterfront land, complete with a rare on-title beach (approximately 100sqm), a boatshed and pool. Representing the pinnacle of what this idyllic location has to offer, this expertly designed resort-style home captures magical uninterrupted views across the Pittwater to Lion and Scotland islands. One of the area\'s finest properties, it offers an opportunity to secure your own exclusive slice of paradise. Idyllic family living and entertaining - The four bedroom, five bathroom home features a luxurious master suite with a dressing room, accessories closet, kitchenette and an indoor/outdoor ensuite with a freestanding stone bath. Expansive free-flowing living and dining areas are framed by fully retractable sliding doors achieving a seamless integration with the alfresco spaces. The billiard room encompasses a fully equipped bar opening out to the pool deck. Sure to inspire the most fastidious chefs, the bespoke kitchen has been designed by Porcelanosa Studio and finished with Spanish granite benchtops, mother of pearl splashbacks and Miele appliances. World-class facilities - As you would expect from a property of this calibre, the home offers an array of unique prestige amenities. At the water\'s edge it boasts a fully equipped boatshed with a 6.1 metre amphibious SEALEGS boat included. A glass mosaic infinity edge gas heated pool and spa features swim jets and a motorised pool cover, while indoors you will find a steam room/spa which seats six. Dine alfresco with your own wood-fired pizza oven, work out in the dedicated gym or take some time out in the meditation hut set amid lush tropical gardens.  Meticulous attention to detail - The result of four years of painstaking construction, Kahala has been carefully crafted, with no detail overlooked in the pursuit of total perfection and an atmosphere of relaxed sophistication. Rustic accents of timber and stone have been integrated into the beautiful contemporary design. Wide recycled ironbark boards grace the floors while Italian stone feature walls add texture. Designer lighting creates ambience, a sandstone gas fireplace adds warmth and hand-carved timber doors add an exotic feel. Outdoors, heat strips and a motorised Vergola roof provide year-round comfort for alfresco entertaining.
